commitResults.messageBody: "Item" is too generic and to standardise with other functions in the same class

commitResults.messageTitle: Update saving tasks to local directory after each modification to the storage * Add and delete are followed by a full save of current taskList to local directory * Remove hard fix to save tasks from Karen App * Add consistent throwing of errors
Add gradle support
Fix bug where marking and unmarking tasks is not saved to storage immediately
Implement porting of features from CLI interface to GUI
Add welcome message at application startup

Remove and clean unnecessary functions leftover from the implementation of a GUI - Remove UI's variable to no longer requiring System.in and System.out - Ui is to mainly centralise formatting to within the class itself - Remove unnecessary imports
Add checkstyle support
Clean up according to checkstyle - Fix lexicographical sorting of imports - Modify access levels of variables and added necessary getter functions - Fix whitespace and bracing formatting
Add custom stylings to GUI - Add custom images - Add color stylings to background and chat dialog
Clean up test cases - Refactored UiTest to remove testing based on print statements - Sorted import statements

Refactor code - Add space inbetween main message and parameters in the comments - Replace usage of `this` in constructor and referenced areas to make code more Java-like - Add @inheritDoc for overwritten methods under karen.task - Add comments for execute method in karen.command - Minor renaming variables
Add assertions
commitResults.messageBody: Assertions mainly added in areas to supplement logic-checking in switch cases or if-blocks where default configurations are already set in place; hence the code should not possibly be an empty or null

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code and replace configurations - Remove additional this statements to make code more Java-like - Add minor comments and edits to spacing - Replace references to static configs and launch config
Remove function in Storage to display warning with Ui
commitResults.messageBody:
The chatbot's I/O handling has changed from CLI to GUI. This means that Storage objects' interaction with Ui will no longer be displayed on the GUI.

All references in Storage to Ui are removed.

This is done in preparation to prevent future conflicts if and when Storage needs to propagate message towards the GUI instead.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Code - Remove empty constructors - Remove deprecated methods - Remove duplicate variables in different classes
Replace error logging messages used with InvalidCommand and KarenException to enum
commitResults.messageBody:
Magic strings used to be scattered throughout the codebase. This makes it hard to track the error messages logged to user and hard to configure.

Hence, InvalidMessage acts as a config to store all error messages logged to user.

With the change, it is easier to track error logging messages in a single enum and allows for standardisation of messages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Replace `if` block with `switch` block for consistency
Implement C-Update
commitResults.messageBody:
Added to allow edits to Tasks stored in Karen

Add functionality to edit `description` attribute of Task stored.

This is to allow user to edit Tasks without deleting and recreating Task object

commitResults.messageTitle: Add fixes for successful gradle build - Removed configs for old testing redirection scripts - Fixed checkstyle issues - Fixed UiTest
Add time attribute to creation of Deadline and Event
Refactor code to update error logging/handling with InvalidMessage Enum
